entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -26.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
